=== POWERLINE ORIGINAL SYMBOLS ===
  U+E0A0  Branch
  U+E0A1  Line Number
  U+E0A2  Lock
  U+E0A3  Column Number

  U+E0B0  Right Solid
  U+E0B1  Right Thin
  U+E0B2  Left Solid
  U+E0B3  Left Thin

=== POWERLINE EXTRA (NERD FONTS TRIANGLES) ===
  U+E0C0  Lower Left Triangle
  U+E0C1  Lower Right Triangle
  U+E0C2  Upper Left Triangle
  U+E0C3  Upper Right Triangle

=== NERD FONTS POWERLINE-STYLE GIT ICONS ===
  U+E725  Git
  U+E727  Git Branch
  U+E728  Git Merge
  U+E729  Git Compare

=== NERD FONTS DISTRO ICONS (COMMON IN PROMPTS) ===
  U+E706  Arch Linux
  U+E712  Ubuntu
  U+F303  Arch (alt)
  U+F304  CentOS
  U+F306  Debian

=== NERD FONTS COMMON UI ICONS ===
  U+F120  Terminal
  U+F1BE  Database
  U+F1E2  Bomb
  U+F6D5  Docker

=== MIXED DEMO (SEPARATORS + ICONS) ===
██░░▒▒█        

=== END ===
